thread.title_full: Jersey Airport's new cargo centre: how will it work? | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Jersey Airport's new cargo centre: how will it work? | Channel
text:
Away from the check-in desks and security at Jersey airport, a whole team of people work on getting cargo from planes into the island. Bosses say the current cargo centre is old and run down.
The old cargo centre, described as Play video The old building is being replaced by a new Â£8 million centre, which has been funded by the Ports of Jersey through landing fees, money from the car park and other charges.
It also means the airport will be able to have double the number of tenants.
The centre has been built for efficiency, cargo will be able to move more effectively from the planes that bring it in, to the warehouse that will sort it.
Play video Works on the building will finish next month.
Last updated Wed 26 Aug 2015 Travel Jersey
